A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an awful cluster. Not all that's old is gold; sometimes old stuff is just garbage. This movie starts with stupid\, adds a dash of pure unadulterated gerrymandering (hi Yoda)\, and ends with a promise of more punishment at the hands of Disney and its henchmen. \nThe initial premise is from a Star Wars book\, but executed so poorly that it took destruction of a legend and an entire fleet of bad guys to have the one saving moment of this contorted hole of a plot. Please stop giving Disney money. Don't watch this awfulness.\nR.I.P. Carrie Fisher. Sorry it ended this way for you.
